snippet: Shares opened sharply higher, with the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index pushing beyond 1,600 points, and the Dow Jones industrial average briefly exceeding 15,000 points.
abstract: Investors breathe easier after Standard & Poor's 500-stock index climbs past 1,600 for first time and Dow Jones industrial average breaches 15,000 during day, both psychologically important milestones.
lead_paragraph: Shares opened sharply higher, with the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index pushing beyond 1,600 points, and the Dow Jones industrial average briefly exceeding 15,000 points.

headline.seo: Markets Soar to New Highs on Jobs Data
headline.main: S.&P. 500 Surpasses 1,600 as Job Gains Top Forecast
headline.print_headline: S.&P. 500 Surpasses 1,600 As Job Gains Top Forecast
